mdRecord.dcterms:title: Delegates of the Republic of Liberia Centennial Commission arrive at Mount Vernon, November 26, 1946
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white photographic print of delegates of the Republic of Liberia Centennial Commission arriving at Mount Vernon. The group is met by Mount Vernon's Resident Superintendent Charles C. Wall. The photographer's stamp on the reverse reads: Please credit Turner, Jr. Specialized Photographer, U. S. and Foreign Distribution, 1934 - 11th St. N. W., Washington 1, D. C., U.S.A.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
Texas Gate
